solution_line_template: To purchase a book for each student, Sally needs: {num_students} x ${cost_per_book} = $<<{num_students}*{cost_per_book}={total_cost_needed}>>{total_cost_needed}.
She thus needs to pay ${total_cost_needed} - ${money_given} = $<<{total_cost_needed}-{money_given}={out_of_pocket_payment}>>{out_of_pocket_payment} out of pocket.
